title: Katie Price fans confused as son Jett appears to spend the day with both parents
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price has left fans baffled after appearing to claim she's spending the day with at least two of her five children... despite youngest son Jett appearing on his dad's Instagram .

The 41-year-old mum of five shared a snap of six-year-old Jett standing in a garden alongside her 17-year-old son Harvey, captioning it: "Love Sunday mornings with my boys."

In the picture, both brothers seem to be at Katie's on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson's house, as it has the same wooden shed he built in his garden earlier this year.

But while Katie was insinuating she had Jett with her today, his dad Kieran Hayler shared live footage of the boy on his own Instagram Story running around a family attraction.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Jett joined his little sister Bunny and some kid pals for a day out at Tulleys Farm in West Sussex, which is hosting its annual Shocktober Fest this month.

Both kids were dressed up in Halloween costumes as they tore around the venue, posing with characters and lobbing apples in a slingshot game.

Fans of Katie were confused as to how Jett managed to be with both his separated parents at the same time.

One told Katie: "Have you seen kierans live stream on IG, pulling you out about claiming you had kids."

Another said sarcastically: "Those kids are remarkable; two places at once."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

And a third dubbed her "desperate to get people to believe she's playing mum this weekend".

Just last night, Katie shared a snap of Jett and Bunny eating dinner with their older brother Junior on a garden bench.

"Jett loves finding things to show us all our little explorer," she captioned the family shot.

However, the children didn't appear to be dressed for the chilly autumnal weather, prompting speculation Katie had used an old picture of her kids.

And Kieran backed up that theory when he filmed Bunny waking up at his house this morning.

Meanwhile, Junior and Princess - her children from her first marriage to Peter Andre - have been spending half term at their dad's.

(Image: Instagram)

Junior is said to be so embarrassed by the state of Katie's mucky mansion - currently undergoing a renovation project - that he's refusing to stay with his mum.

A source told Mirror Online: "He was so embarrassed by the mess and preferred Peter's cleaner house. He is like any teenage boy and embarrasses easily so he just didn't visit the house.

"He still saw his mum but wouldn't stay overnight because he just couldn't stand the mess.

"Junior also needed to get to school and Katie not driving meant it was more difficult to get around."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Earlier this month, Katie was slapped with a two-year driving ban after failing to tell police who was behind the wheel of her bright pink Range Rover when it crashed in October last year.

It's her fourth such ban in two years and means she won't be allowed to drive herself anywhere until late 2021.

Katie has also been told to find thousands of pounds to pay off her spiralling debts in the next six weeks - or she could risk losing the house.

The former glamour model will face a petition to make her bankrupt when she's hauled back to an insolvency court at the end of November.

Mirror Online has contacted Katie and Kieran's reps for comment.
description: Katie Price's followers called her out after seeing footage of her son Jett on his dad Kieran Hayler's Instagram - despite her saying she "loves Sunday mornings" with her boys
